sense.def:
A wheel
je okrogel predmet, ki se vrti okoli svoje osi. Take predmete privijemo pod vozilo, da se lahko premika.

seg.quote: The train started, its wheels squealing against the metal tracks.

sense.def:
A wheel
ima tudi enak pomen kot
a steering wheel
.

To wheel something
pomeni nekaj potiskati naprej, na primer kolo ali voziček.

seg.quote: My father was wheeling his bicycle up the hill.
The equipment had to be wheeled around on a large trolley.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
wheels
, se premika v krožni črti ali po delnem obodu kroga.

seg.quote: The sky becomes filled with birds wheeling back and forth.
I wheeled around and shook her hand.
